jobDescription: Why this role? This individual will have responsibility for ensuring availability and correctness of underlying data for analytical reports on the performance of physicians, hospitals, and other health care providers, etc. Primarily, this will entail understanding and improving the flow of data through the Episode Connect Care management platform.
